law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 43, effective July 1, 1982. --- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 6, effective February 20, 1960.

metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 46 would have amended this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
